(Vamprah/Perceptor/Najah)

:: Vamprah ::

Vamprah was still in stasis lock,=
 while she was moving a small gadget (that was a 3d hologram maching) fell =
over her. And something that seemed a gun appeared under her arm.

:: PErce=
ptor::

Perceptor avoided Silverbolt's shot and shot at him.

::Najah::
Naj=
ah had several things to say at Zardus but thougt a sencond he thought that=
 the best was doesn't say nothing by now.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
 From: Yanshosh@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, October =
29, 2000 8:49 PM
  Subject: Re: Alliance


  I welcome the challenge, Ryo. =
You picked a pretty bad time to do 
  this, though, not too many people are=
 gonna be able to sneak up on 
  the Alliance base right now, or for a whil=
e yet. But, we'll see who 
  gloats in the end (I don't like gloating so it=
s either gonna be you 
  or no one).

  Friendly tip to everyone: Don't lea=
ve your comp cases open and 
  unattended if you have animals with claws/te=
eth in the house. I just 
  replaced my video card and half the wires in my=
 comp.


  ::DevilDuer/Zardus/WarMachine/Reptilica/Bloodystrike/Perndabot::=


  DevilDuer checks his internal scanners as Diamond walks out of the 
  r=
oom, keeping track of her. He still didn't completely trust her.

  He look=
s back at Vamprah, speaking up as she moves in her 
  sleep. "Hey, wake up,=
" he says, ready to fight just in case, "Rest 
  time's over."
  ~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Zardus frowns, looking at the battle ground,=
 only two Mafia members 
  and another bot fighting against the Alliance. H=
e turns around, 
  flying off toward the Alliance base.

  "Destroy their s=
hip and then return to base," he says into his comm-
  link to the Alliance=
 members there, "We will change locations soon."

  "Come with me," he says=
 to Najah as he flies by him.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Wa=
rMachine stumbles back as shots hit him, returning fire at 
  Shokaract and=
 Surge, several dozen laser shots and a few missiles 
  flying at the two.
=
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Bloodystrike catches up to Life,=
 breathing heavily. "Het, slow down 
  here," he says, "WHat are you lookin=
g for?"
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Reptilica lands at the A=
lliance base, entering it.
  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
  Pernd=
abot laughs to himself as Klant leaves, obvioustly mistaking him 
  for a M=
aximal.

  "Let's go," he says to BrightBlade, walking out of the room.



=

  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Airshadow Nightlight" <airly2000@y...> 
  wr=
ote:
  > ::Vamprah::
  > 
  > Vamprah was deeply sleep, when DevilDuel open=
ed th cr's door. Her 
  > body agited quikly as if his precence was a menac=
e but soon her 
  > breathing was getting calmyly and her movements relaxed=
, as if she 
  > were in a safe place. The expresion of her face was almost=
 pacefuly 
  > and her movement were slow.
  > 
  > She seemed that she was=
 taking a nap. Anyone could guess the fierce 
  > fighting that minutes bef=
ore she had been.
  > 
  > Vamprah moved slowly as if she tried to find a c=
onfortable position 
  > to sleep.
  > 
  > (NOte to Airshdow: If it's poss=
ible sleep confotable in that place)


        eGroups Sponsor
